Continue reading...

items.title: This authoritarian Trump statement didn't get the attention it deserves
items.standfirst: Donald Trump's declaration that, "I have the right to do anything I want", didn't get the attention it deserved.
items.content: Donald Trump's declaration that, "I have the right to do anything I want", didn't get the attention it deserved.

ai_summary: Donald Trump made a statement.
He declared he has the right to do anything.
The statement did not get enough attention.
The article implies the statement is significant.
The article does not provide further details.

clusters.title: Hamas chief spokesperson killed in strikes, Israel says
clusters.neutral_headline: Hamas Chief Spokesperson Killed in Strikes

items.title: Hamas chief spokesperson killed in strikes, Israel says
items.standfirst: Since the war began, Abu Obeida had issued dozens of televised speeches, always appearing in military fatigues and a red keffiyeh scarf to obscure his face, and published audio messages, press releases and social media posts.
items.content: Since the war began, Abu Obeida had issued dozens of televised speeches, always appearing in military fatigues and a red keffiyeh scarf to obscure his face, and published audio messages, press releases and social media posts.

ai_summary: Hamas chief spokesperson was killed.
The killing was in Israeli strikes.
Abu Obeida gave televised speeches.
He always wore military fatigues and a scarf.
He published audio messages and social media posts.

clusters.title: 'Huge' leak from gas plant kept secret from public in 'national scandal'
clusters.neutral_headline: Gas Plant Leak Kept Secret from Public

items.title: 'Huge' leak from gas plant kept secret from public in 'national scandal'
items.standfirst: Documents reveal the scale of carbon pollution leaking from a Darwin LNG tank was like adding 8,300 new cars to the road every year. It is about to be filled again.
items.content: Documents reveal the scale of carbon pollution leaking from a Darwin LNG tank was like adding 8,300 new cars to the road every year. It is about to be filled again.

ai_summary: A "huge" leak from a gas plant was kept secret.
The leak was a "national scandal".
Documents reveal the scale of carbon pollution.
The leak was like adding 8,300 cars to the road.
The plant is about to be filled again.
